name: Bewitched (LynneMeyer)
description:
It’s the new moon, and a unicorn is missing from Brenda Howard Grove. You and the other bi+ witches of your coven must find and rescue this beloved member of your found family.

Let your bi flag fly in this analog micro RPG full of witchy fun! Choose from 8 character options:

  • Traditional Witch
  • Green Witch
  • Hedge Witch
  • Water Witch
  • Divination Witch
  • Cosmic Witch
  • Music Witch
  • Tech Witch

Each witch specializes in a different skill, and is equipped with a unique magickal tool and wand.

Make the game as silly or as serious as you'd like, and celebrate our vibrant and diverse bi+ community.
